name: F-Zero™ Maximum Velocity
description: Original Release Date: June 2001 Calling all speed demons! All galactic speed limits are about to be broken! F-Zero™ Maximum Velocity has arrived, and the future of racing has never looked so sweet. Whether you're a veteran or a race rookie, you'll need to put some practice laps in gear. Then, challenge your skills by mastering the Grand Prix circuit and beat your competitors out of the race! Unlock hidden vehicles and tracks as you master the 20 different courses at four difficulty levels. Also test your best time in the Championship mode! It's max speed all the way to the finish line!
